title: News24.com | Coronavirus: EFF forbids all meetings, closes offices as lockdown only 'logical' solution
description: The EFF has welcomed the government's decision to lock down all non-essential movements in South Africa to contain the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus.
content:
The EFF has welcomed the government's decision to lock down all non-essential movements in South Africa to contain the rapid spread of the novel coronavirus (Covid-19).
